name: .XVCT File Extension
summary: Learn about .XVCT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: XML project file created by VISE X, an application used to build Mac OS X installer files; contains references to the installation files and actions required to make the installation; used for exporting binary .VCT projects using XML formatting.

content: XVCT files are actually Mac OS X bundles. You can right-click them and select "Show Package Contents" to see the included files. A property list (.PLIST) file saves the project settings in an XML format.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
